price: 41. Waxaa Calaamo ugu filan inaan ku qaadnay ubadkoodii6 Doonidii buuxday.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
footnotes: 6. Weedha durriyad halkan waxaa loola jeedaa fir (waa inay yihiin firkii Nuux) ee laga badbaadshay daadkii weynaa ee lagu halaagay qoonkii Nuux.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
